thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com
thread.title: R. Dempsey

author: R. Dempsey
title: R. Dempsey
text: Home advisor is easy to use. I've tried other companies just to find myself flooded with incoming phone calls from companies and individuals wanting my business. I've used Homeadvisor 3 times now, and each time I've only received calls from the companies that I actually submitted a request to. You can even call them directly if your not sure, just explain your situation and they'll point you in the right direction.
